name: Moon Drive - GWJ48
description:
Drive under the moon and beat your best time. Game and assets were created in a week for the Godot Wild Jam 48

Controls

keyboard or joypad controls

Keyboard:

  • Up / W: Accelerate
  • Down/S: Brake
  • Left and Right/A and D: Steer left and right
  • Space: Drift
  • Escape: Pause

Joypad (Ps4):

  • Left stick: Steer left or right
  • X: Accelerate
  • Circle: Brake
  • Square: Drift
  • Start: Pause

Up Arrow / W: Accelerate
